column2: BRIEF-Royce Value Trust Announces Terms For Its Common Stock Rights Offering May 18 (Reuters) - Royce Value Trust Inc: * ROYCE VALUE TRUST, INC. ANNOUNCES TERMS FOR ITS COMMON STOCK RIGHTS OFFERING * ROYCE VALUE TRUST- FIXED CLOSE OF BUSINESS MAY 30 AS RECORD DATE FOR DETERMINATION OF STOCKHOLDERS ENTITLED TO PARTICIPATE IN STOCK RIGHTS OFFERING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
